means: 浪费的，效率低的，不节约的

sentence.Network_en: It would be uneconomical to send a brand new tape.
sentence.Network_cn: 寄一盘新磁带过去不合算。

sentence.Network_en: Even the successful flying boats proved, in the end, uneconomical.
sentence.Network_cn: 即使是成功的水上飞机最终也未能盈利。

sentence.Network_en: The methods employed are old-fashioned and uneconomical.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用的方法很老套，没什么效益。

entry.tran: 不能盈利的；没有效益的；不经济的
entry.def: If you say that an action, a method, or a product is uneconomical, you mean that it does not make a profit.

example.ex: It would be uneconomical to send a brand new tape...
example.tran: 寄一盘新磁带过去不合算。

example.ex: The methods employed are old-fashioned and uneconomical...
example.tran: 采用的方法很老套，没什么效益。

means.word_mean: 1. inefficient in use of time and effort and materials;

means.word_mean: 浪费的;效率低的;不节约的

sentences.en: I was taken in by the salesman—the car turned out to be uneconomical and unreliable.
sentences.cn: 推销员欺骗了我——那辆汽车结果既不经济又不牢靠。
